name: Bobbleheads want to dance
description:
THE AUDIO IS IMPORTANT PART OF THIS GAME. I would recommend using headphones.

This a super simple game were you have to click with the mouse on the Bobbleheads to make sure that they always are moving.

The game was made for Ludum Dare 46, and the theme for the jam was "Keep it alive".

The game was made with

  • UE4
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • LMMS
  • Audacity

Good luck and have fun
